title: x/build/builders: build race runtime on all supported OSes
body:
Currently when I need to rebuild race runtime (syso files) I need to find a linux,
windows, darwin and freebsd machine; ssh into them and do some manual
actions. This is painful, non-reproducible and only I know how to do
it. If we have linux/windows/darwin/freebsd VMs on GCE, we could automate the process of
building the race runtime. Basically you give it revision number, and it gives you 4
race_goos.syso files.
Brad says it's totally possible.
